titleStmt.title: His Majesties gracious declaration James R. Our conduct has been such in all times, as ought to have perswaded the world that we are firm, and constant to our resolutions: ...
Proclamations. 1688-04-27.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Holy-Rood-House, re-printed by Mr. P. B[ruce] enginier, and printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty, for his houshold, chapel and colledge,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; printer's name from Steele.
On p. 4: Given at our court at Whitehall, the twenty seventh day of April, 1688, in the courth year of our reign. By His Majesties special command.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
